nodes.text: Alderaan Biotics was an Alderaan-based hydroponics company. Their Borleias satellite facility, abandoned before the destruction of Alderaan due to lack of profit, was eventually reactivated by Evir Derricote and later co-opted by the forces of Ysanne Isard prior to the Bacta War. Rogue Squadron would soon recapture the facility. Through the Borleias facility, Alderaan Biotics would go on to become a large manufacturer of rylca.
